name: lambda-generate-url
description: Lambda function to generate Sigma embed URLs

scripts.package: npm run build && cp dist/index.js index.js && zip -r generateSigmaEmbedURL.zip node_modules index.js && rm index.js
scripts.deploy: npm run package && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name generateSigmaEmbedURL --zip-file fileb://generateSigmaEmbedURL.zip
